name: google-keep-desktop
description: A simple desktop application to run google keep

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=icons/Icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="Tulio Magalhaes" --version-string.FileDescription="Google Keep for Desktop" --version-string.ProductName="Google Keep Desktop"

author: Túlio Magalhães
